nodes.name: deployContract

devdoc.details: This contract is responsible for 1) daily deployment of new market contracts 2) settling old contracts 3) minting of long and short tokens 4) storage of DSProxy info 5) enabling batch token redemption.

balanceOf(address).details: used to prove to 0x that the wallet balance was correctly transferred.

batchRedeem(address[],uint256[]).details: called by a DsProxy wallet which passes control from the caller using delegatecal to enable the caller to redeem bulk tokens in one tx. Parameters are parallel arrays. Only one side can be redeemed at a time. This is to simplify redemption as the same caller will likely never be both long and short in the same contract.

constructor.details: will deloy a new DSProxy Factory

dailySettlement(uint256,uint256,bytes32[.details: can only be called by hinelemon oracle

params.marketAndsTokenNames: bytes array of market, long and short token names

getExpiringMarketContract().details: return address(0) if there is no expired contract

getUserAddressOrDSProxy(address).details: get user own address or DSProxy address if user have one

isDailyContractDeployed().details: this prevents position tokens from being minted if the Honeylemon oracle has not deployed a new contract in the last 24 hours to prevent a trader from getting a stale price.
isDailyContractDeployed().return: bool true if there is a fresh contract, false if there is not a fresh contract

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

mintPositionTokens(uint256,address,addre.details: can only be called from 0x minter bridge

params.longTokenRecipient: address of long token recipient (will receive token at this address unless address have deployed DSProxy)
params.shortTokenRecipient: address of short token recipient (will receive token at this address unless address have deployed DSProxy)

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

setMinterBridgeAddress(address).details: can only be called by owner

setOracleAddress(address).details: can only be called by owner

settleMarketContract(uint256,address).details: can only be called from honeylemon oracle. Can be called directly to settle expiring market without deploying new onemri MRI valuemarketContractAddress market contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Market Contract Proxy.

balanceOf(address).notice: get user long token blanace for the current day

batchRedeem(address[],uint256[]).notice: batch redeem long or short tokens for different markets

calculateRequiredCollateral(uint256).notice: calculate collateral needed to mint Long/Short tokens

dailySettlement(uint256,uint256,bytes32[.notice: deploy new market and settle last one (if met settlement requirements)

generateContractSpecs(uint256,uint256).notice: generate market contract specs (cap price, expiration timestamp)

getFillableAmount(address).notice: calculate the TH amount that can be filled based on owners BTC balance and allowance

getFillableAmounts(address[]).notice: get amounts of TH that can be filled

getLatestMarketCollateralPool().notice: get latest market collateral pool address

isDailyContractDeployed().notice: checks if a new contract has been deployed in the last 24 hours

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

userdoc.notice: Handles the interconnection of the Market Protocol with 0x to facilitate issuance of long and short tokens at order execution.
